description:
The jig is up as Luffy and the others make a daring dash to avoid the furious Navy! Can they escape without having to turn to fight - and after they`ve had a chance to raid the cabinets for food?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Drei hartnäckige Kerle! – Großer Verfolgungskampf mit den Strohhüten!
El trío persistente – ¡La gran búsqueda de los de Sombrero de Paja!
Les trois implacables. Une grande poursuite contre les Mugiwara !
Shuunen no 3 Nin: Mugiwara Ichimi Dai Chase!
The Implacable Three! A Big Chase After the Straw Hats!
Неугомонная тройка - Большая погоня за Мугиварами!
الثلاثة العنيدون! مطاردة هائلة خلف طاقم قبعة القش!
執念の3人 麦わら一味大追撃戦[チェイス]!
